rev.comment: restore long-standing phrasing of lede per sourced discussion in article--Allmusic's is just one opinion; a plurality of sources describe Motorhead as preceding and inspiring NWOBHM
/* Thrash metal */ a little too big
/* Thrash metal */ add wikimedia commons free-use pic...note that there is no pic for the thrash section
/* Origins: late 1960s and early 1970s */ brk up long para
/* Antecedents: mid-1960s */ brk up long para
/* Lyrical themes */ rmv "purely"....rmv discussion of intelligibility
/* Characteristics */ note on keyboards...Hammond in 1970s >>>> synth in 1980s and following decades
fix sloppy mistake in last edit (made by me)
copyedit Lede...previous wording implied that Motorhead was not part of NWOBHM...AllMusicGuide claims Motorhead part of NWOBHM
